SELECT mdm.item_id,mdm.item_category_id,mdm.item_category_id as category_id,mdm.item_description,ic.category_name,iio.amount,iio.price, iio.on_hand_quantity,iio.max,iio.min,fo.org_name, CONCAT(iio.item_id,'-',iio.org_id) as tempid FROM mdm_item mdm INNER JOIN mdm_item_category ic on mdm.item_category_id=ic.category_id INNER JOIN inv_item_onhand iio ON mdm.item_id = iio.item_id inner join fnd_org fo on iio.org_id=fo.org_id where 1=1
and mdm.item_description like '%${item_description}%'
and mdm.item_category_id ='${item_category_id}'
and mdm.item_id ='${item_id}'
and fo.org_id ='${org_id}'
